snippet: Researchers said that while creating functional kidneys for people was a long way off, replacement organs made like the rat kidneys would have benefits over other methods.
abstract: Researchers at Massachusetts General Hospital in Boston have made functioning rat kidneys in laboratory, bioengineering achievement that may one day lead to ability to create replacement organs for people with kidney disease; findings are published online in journal Nature Medicine.
lead_paragraph: Researchers said that while creating functional kidneys for people was a long way off, replacement organs made like the rat kidneys would have benefits over other methods.

headline.seo: Rat Kidneys Made in Lab Seen as Step to Human Transplants
headline.main: Rat Kidneys Made in Lab Point to Aid for Humans
headline.print_headline: Rat Kidneys Made in Lab Point to Aid For Humans
